hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar said:"The Messenger of Allah enjoined the Zakah of Ramadan on everyone, young and old, free and slave, male and female, a Sa of dates or a Sa of barley

chapter.ara-name: باب فَرْضِ زَكَاةِ رَمَضَانَ عَلَى الصَّغِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Obligation Of Zakah Of Ramadan For Children
